text: The decision comes as the Sony - produced drama was saved days after cancellation last year. Talks for a two - hour movie to wrap it up continue. Timeless has been canceled a second time at NBC. The network has decided to cancel the beloved time - travel drama from producers Sony Pictures Television Studios. Sources say the studio and NBC are continuing talks for a potential two - hour movie to wrap up the finale cliffhanger. The series, which saw the network stunningly reverse its cancellation after its freshman run, had been in negotiations between Sony TV and NBC. While not a ratings breakout, Timeless averages a 1. 2 in the key adults 18 - 49 demo and nearly 5 million total viewers with seven days of delayed viewing ; the May 13 season two finale ticked up slightly ( though it did not best its season average )
